figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Evolution of scientific literature on sport and refugees, 1995â€“2019.

claims.sentence: As Figure 1 shows, the volume of published research on the topic has been on the increase in recent years, most notably from 2017 onwards.

The total number of publications in this two-and-a-half-year period was 39, which corresponds to nearly half (46%) of the entire sample.Characteristics of the Studies
Geographical Locations
Figure 2 visualizes the countries where the empirical data reported in the publications were collected.
Figure 3 summarizes the main qualitative and quantitative research methods used in the literature.
